lines: In your eyes, Vidya, I find my shyness,
Tears of joy from your eyes, like pearls divine,
I'll cherish them in my heart's sacred shrine.
When you wear the necklace of joyous pearls, Vidya,
My eyes too shall weep tears of bliss,
I'll be the shore to your ocean of happiness.
My love for you, Vidya, will transcend all bounds,
No calamity can break this bond profound,
I'll sacrifice my life, yet keep you safe and sound.
Love isn't just roses on special days, Vidya,
It's the beating heart, fervently at bay,
Drenched in love's dreams day by day.
My heart blooms at the sight of you, Vidya,
A smile on my face, tranquility in view,
Lost in love's dreams, forever anew.
The day you entered my life, Vidya, it overflowed,
Like ending a long journey, a new episode,
Your love gave me a purpose, a code.
I love you immensely, Vidya, with every beat,
Each breath feels your love's heat,
Every word, a call to love, complete.
I promise to keep your happiness intact, Vidya,
My every heartbeat longs for your pact,
Tears of joy from my eyes, a love fact.
Your touch ignites a path within, Vidya,
My soul dances in love's spin,
With you, every moment's a win.
Holding you, Vidya, our hearts connect,
Beat by beat, our love reflects,
A bond that nothing can ever affect.
Your love, Vidya, a treasure beyond compare,
In every breath, I find you there,
With you, life's burdens I can bear.
Embracing you, Vidya, life feels complete,
Our love, a bond no one can defeat,
Forever together, our hearts beat.
Through embraces, Vidya, our souls unite,
Love's radiance, a heavenly light,
In your arms, everything feels right.
Each embrace, Vidya, a love story retold,
Two hearts entwined, a love so bold,
In your warmth, my world unfolds.
Your embrace, Vidya, a symphony of love's grace,
In your arms, I find my place,
Forever yours, in love's embrace.
Love's embrace, Vidya, a sanctuary divine,
Your touch, like poetry in every line,
With you, my heart's forever entwined.
Your embrace, Vidya, a melody of love's sweet song,
In your embrace, I belong,
With you, my love grows strong.
Each embrace, Vidya, a chapter of our love's story,
Two souls intertwined, in love's glory,
In your arms, I find my sanctuary.
Your embrace, Vidya, a symphony of love's refrain,
In your arms, all sorrows wane,
Forever with you, love's eternal gain.
Each embrace, Vidya, a testament of our love,
Two hearts united, like stars above,
In your arms, I find solace enough.
Your embrace, Vidya, a canvas of love's art,
In your embrace, I find my heart,
Forever yours, never to depart.
In your arms, Vidya, my dreams renew,
Forever together, me and you.
